short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds small utilities and interface improvements to KanbanFlow boards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes the next changes to the kanbanflow interface:

- View notifications by groups: In the notifications sidebar, show buttons to show only tasks related or comments related notifications.

More features will be added soon. You can open an issue in the repository: https://github.com/barcia/kanbanflow-plus

This extension is not related to the KanbanFlow team.
